review: i truly love this movie and its my all time favorite one  because of kareena and hritik.kareena is looking too pretty in the movie and love the way she expresses her love for father. i like the chemistry between kareena and hritik and love that song kasam ki  kasam  a lot. it has love, friendship and all the emotions,i recommend everyone to watch it, i rate it 4/5
